page.title: 02Industry-EmploymentSprowston
page.content: The United Closures and Plastics Factory covers an area of 16.75 acres. Seven hundred and thirty people are employed at the factory.The factory has some workers there who are on the youth training scheme. Legal and General previously owned the factory land when it was used for Boulton and Paul's leisure activities. The factory was built twenty four years ago and production has increased over recent years. The factory produces plastic bottles and plastic closures.It also produces glasses and glass containers for spirits. Main outlets in this country for their products are Marks and Spencers and Boots. Goods are also sold in Scandinavia ,France and Germany.The employees mostly live in Sprowston.
